ThingDef.Name: AT_AP_Power_A
ThingDef.label: Anty Cataglyphis armor
ThingDef.description:
A powered armor that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.

It has a fire control system to reduce aiming time.

can deploy a force field that increases movement speed.

ThingDef.label: Anty Cataglyphis helmet
ThingDef.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.

ThingDef.Name: AT_AP_Power_E
ThingDef.label: Anty Nylanderia armor
ThingDef.description:
A powered armor that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.

It has a fire control system to reduce aiming time.

Although its armor is thin, it can effectively evade enemies by momentarily disrupting their vision.

AbilityDef.label: Invisibility
AbilityDef.description: Instantly distorts the light to escape the enemy's line of sight.

ThingDef.label: Anty Nylanderia helmet
ThingDef.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire and toxin. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings, and purifies the toxins entering the body. It still won't prevent food poisoning.\n\nAlthough its armor is thin, Designates an enemy to make allies' attacks more effective.

AbilityDef.label: laser guidance
AbilityDef.description: Designates an enemy so you can hit it more effectively.

ThingDef.Name: AT_AP_AdditionalPower_E
ThingDef.label: Anty Nylanderia Additional armor
ThingDef.description: A powered helmat that is developed to compensate for their weakness against fire. The refleum radiant panels and insulation panels work depending on the surroundings.\n\nAlthough its armor is thin, it emits a gas that delays the bleeding.

HediffDef.label: Hemostatic gas
HediffDef.description: under the influence of gas which delays bleeding.
